text: Nuccio Rinaldis (Milan 1943 - Milan 2015) was an Italian sound engineer. == Biography == Nuccio Rinaldis is best known in Italian pop music business for being the reference sound engineer of famous Italian singer Mina for many years. Rinaldis's work can be traced in almost the singer's complete discography, both albums and singles from 1967 onwards, with the many hits he was involved in. It should be mentioned that thanks to the test recording proposed by Rinaldis, the record Mina Live '78 was released as the double album.
